name: Lok Jan Seva Kendra
briefDescription: we are currently working in a medical mission " Anemia free hazaribagh " in this mission we have target more   than 20 village of sadar block in district hazaribagh ( jharkhand ) , and mostly people's in these village are  bellow poverty so they do not priorities their health as priority .according to our survey 6 out of 10 women is  suffering from anemia and 4 out of 7 children's is suffering from anemia so we started this project as a mission but due to lack of proper fund we are not able to give our best
